com.googlecode.aluminumproject.interceptors

Interface ActionInterceptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActionInterceptor, ActionSkipper, WriterReplacer

    public interface ActionInterceptor
    Intercepts one or more of the phases that cause an action to be executed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<ActionPhase> getPhases()
      Returns the set of phases that this action interceptor intercepts.
      void intercept(ActionContext actionContext)
      Intercepts an action phase.

    • Method Detail

      • getPhases

        Set<ActionPhase> getPhases()
        Returns the set of phases that this action interceptor intercepts.
        Returns:
        all phases that are intercepted by this action interceptor

      • intercept

        void intercept(ActionContext actionContext)
               throws AluminumException
        Intercepts an action phase.
        Parameters:
        actionContext - the context of the action
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the phase can't be intercepted
